underlying_goal: To implement a new 'spec-interview' workflow for feature development into the Claude setup, based on a team member's suggestion.
primary_success: Proactively suggesting implementation options (new skill vs. enhancing existing) and then cleanly executing the chosen path, including creating multiple files and updating documentation.
brief_summary: The user proposed adding a spec-based interview workflow. Claude explored the existing setup, proposed creating a new dedicated skill, and implemented it. After user feedback about context bloat, Claude refactored the skill to use reference files, and then updated the main CLAUDE.md to integrate this new step into the standard development process before committing the changes.
